data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 5, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Kawasaki's Leandro Damiao gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Goal! Carlinhos Junior gives Shimizu a 1-0 lead in Shizuoka.
Ryo Takeuchi with an assist there.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 13, At IAI Stadium Nihondaira, Shimizu are penalized for being offside.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Shizuoka to check on Kyohei Noborizato, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 18, The away team has substituted Kyohei Noborizato with Reo Hatate. Toru Oniki is thus making his first change.
In the minute 21, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Ao Tanaka gets an equalizer for Kawasaki. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Leandro Damiao.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 25, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Kawasaki drive into the zone and Ao Tanaka is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 32, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Shimizu's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Shimizu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 37, Koichiro Fukushima awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Free kick Shimizu.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior is on target but unsuccessful.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 40, Goal! Shimizu have got their heads in front thanks to a Renato Augusto strike.
Carlinhos Junior instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 42, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Valdo (Shimizu) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 43, Elsinho of Shimizu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Kaoru Mitoma, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 45, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kawasaki.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Yusuke Goto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Reo Hatate's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 50, Shimizu apply pressure at IAI Stadium Nihondaira and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Kenta Nishizawa but the strike hits the bar!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 52, Kawasaki drives forward and Miki Yamane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Important block from the Shimizu defence as Kaoru Mitoma fires in a strike for Kawasaki.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 57, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Shizuoka.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Yasuto Wakizaka with Kengo Nakamura. This is the second substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Toru Oniki is making the team's third substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
In the minute 60, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yuito Suzuki is replacing Shota Kaneko for the home team.
In the minute 62, Miki Yamane (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 63, The match at IAI Stadium Nihondaira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Carlinhos Junior, who is down injured.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 67, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kawasaki.
Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a second substitution, with Teerasil Dangda replacing Carlinhos Junior.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Kawasaki.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In the minute 72, In Shizuoka Shimizu drive forward through Elsinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yuito Suzuki (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 73, Shimizu's Ryo Takeuchi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 74, Yusuke Goto of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Kawasaki make their fourth substitution with Kazuya Yamamura replacing Jesiel.
Manabu Saito is replacing Akihiro Ienaga for Kawasaki at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 78, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Takuo Okubo has recovered and rejoins the match in Shizuoka.
In the minute 81, Koichiro Fukushima waits before resuming play because Takuo Okubo for Shimizu is still down.
Koichiro Fukushima blows against Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi for offside.
In the minute 83, Peter Cklamovski is making the team's third substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Yasufumi Nishimura replacing Renato Augusto.
The home team replace Valdo with Kota Miyamoto.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 87, Shimizu needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Goal! Miki Yamane equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 89, Great play from Kaoru Mitoma to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kawasaki.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Shizuoka.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Shimizu.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
